definitions: the state of being in good condition; robustness

examples.text: concern over the soundness of local financial institutions

definitions: the quality of being based on valid reason or good judgment

examples.text: we will win because of the soundness of our arguments
you really have to question the soundness of these measures

shortDefinitions: quality of being based on valid reason or good judgement

definitions: the quality of being competent or reliable

examples.text: business leaders remain to be convinced of his soundness on economic issues

shortDefinitions: quality of being competent or reliable
